product_name: Shebeest Boardrider Bike Capri Pants - Women's
long_description: From the bike to the beach, the Shebeest Boardrider bike capri pants with removable liner shorts are 2-for-1 for multisport and apres-sport use. Nylon/spandex blend wicks moisture and dries quickly to keep you comfortable. Front zipper with snap-closure waistband. 2 zippered back pockets hold cash and cards. Removable inner bike shorts feature an ergonomic, 4-way stretch chamois with seamless construction for chafe-free comfort. Double loop system attaches liner shorts to outer Shebeest Boardrider bike capri pants. Elastic grippers hold liner shorts in place.
short_description: From the bike to the beach, the Shebeest Boardrider bike capri pants with removable liner shorts are 2-for-1 for multisport and apres-sport use.
